entity.name: omoccurrences
entity.query: SELECT o.occid, o.collid, o.catalogNumber, o.otherCatalogNumbers, o.family, o.sciname, o.tidinterpreted, CONCAT_WS('-',IFNULL(o.family,'not entered'),o.sciname) AS familyscinamecode, o.scientificNameAuthorship, o.identifiedBy, o.dateIdentified, o.typeStatus, o.recordedBy, o.recordNumber, CASE WHEN o.eventdate NOT LIKE '%-00%' THEN DATE_FORMAT(o.eventdate,'%Y-%m-%dT%TZ') ELSE NULL END AS eventDate, CONCAT_WS(' to ',IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(o.eventDate,'%d %M %Y'),''),DATE_FORMAT(MAKEDATE(o.year,o.endDayOfYear),'%d %M %Y')) AS displayDate, o.`year`, o.`month`, o.`day`, o.habitat, o.associatedTaxa, o.cultivationStatus, o.`country`, o.stateProvince, o.`county`, o.municipality, o.locality, o.localitySecurity, o.localitySecurityReason, o.decimalLatitude, o.decimalLongitude, CONCAT('POINT(',o.decimalLongitude,' ',o.decimalLatitude,')') as pointLocation, o.minimumElevationInMeters, o.maximumElevationInMeters, o.observeruid, o.lifeStage, o.sex, o.individualCount, c.InstitutionCode, c.CollectionCode, c.CollectionName, c.icon, c.CollType, c.SortSeq FROM omoccurrences AS o LEFT JOIN omcollections AS c ON o.collid = c.collid
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT o.occid, o.collid, o.catalogNumber, o.otherCatalogNumbers, o.family, o.sciname, o.tidinterpreted, CONCAT_WS('-',IFNULL(o.family,'not entered'),o.sciname) AS familyscinamecode, o.scientificNameAuthorship, o.identifiedBy, o.dateIdentified, o.typeStatus, o.recordedBy, o.recordNumber, CASE WHEN o.eventdate NOT LIKE '%-00%' THEN DATE_FORMAT(o.eventdate,'%Y-%m-%dT%TZ') ELSE NULL END AS eventDate, CONCAT_WS(' to ',IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(o.eventDate,'%d %M %Y'),''),DATE_FORMAT(MAKEDATE(o.year,o.endDayOfYear),'%d %M %Y')) AS displayDate, o.`year`, o.`month`, o.`day`, o.habitat, o.associatedTaxa, o.cultivationStatus, o.`country`, o.stateProvince, o.`county`, o.municipality, o.locality, o.localitySecurity, o.localitySecurityReason, o.decimalLatitude, o.decimalLongitude, CONCAT('POINT(',o.decimalLongitude,' ',o.decimalLatitude,')') as pointLocation, o.minimumElevationInMeters, o.maximumElevationInMeters, o.observeruid, o.lifeStage, o.sex, o.individualCount, c.InstitutionCode, c.CollectionCode, c.CollectionName, c.icon, c.CollType, c.SortSeq FROM omoccurrences AS o LEFT JOIN omcollections AS c ON o.collid = c.collid WHERE o.occid = '${dih.delta.occid}'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT occid FROM images i WHERE (i.InitialTimeStamp > CONVERT_TZ('${dih.last_index_time}','+00:00','-06:00')) UNION SELECT o.occid FROM omoccurrences AS o WHERE (o.dateLastModified > CONVERT_TZ('${dih.last_index_time}','+00:00','-06:00'))

entity.name: images_inner
entity.query: SELECT imgid, thumbnailurl FROM images WHERE occid ='${omoccurrences.occid}' ORDER BY sortsequence

entity.name: genetic_inner
entity.query: SELECT identifier, resourcename, locus FROM omoccurgenetic WHERE occid ='${omoccurrences.occid}'

entity.name: associations_inner
entity.query: SELECT relationship, verbatimsciname FROM omoccurassociations WHERE occid ='${omoccurrences.occid}'

entity.name: clid_inner
entity.query: SELECT CLID FROM fmvouchers WHERE occid ='${omoccurrences.occid}'

entity.name: taxa_inner
entity.query: SELECT ts.family FROM taxstatus AS ts WHERE ts.tid ='${omoccurrences.tidinterpreted}'

entity.name: parenttaxa_inner
entity.query: SELECT te.parenttid FROM taxaenumtree AS te WHERE te.tid ='${omoccurrences.tidinterpreted}'
